plot: In car headlights or the glow of a petrol pump, Kabul's night-time road-sweepers shift heavy dust down an avenue - a Sisyphean job that says much about the state of the country.
title: Dusty Night
plot_es: In car headlights or the glow of a petrol pump, Kabul's night-time road-sweepers shift heavy dust down an avenue - a Sisyphean job that says much about the state of the country.
plot_en: In car headlights or the glow of a petrol pump, Kabul's night-time road-sweepers shift heavy dust down an avenue - a Sisyphean job that says much about the state of the country.
